## KnowledgeBaseService.query() method

Query the knowledge base

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
query(query: string): Promise<KnowledgeBaseResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  query | string | Query to search within the knowledge base, typically a user's question.  Knowledge Base result with either FAQs, suggested, or documents. |

Promise&lt;[KnowledgeBaseResult](./stentor-models.knowledgebaseresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;
